name: DIGIPIXO RUNAS
description:
gif in pixel art.
That work adapts the tag that I use on the streets of Brazilia, a tag that for me is sacred.
understanding cyberspace as the new street or an expansion of it, I believe in the need to adapt graffiti to also occupy cybernetic dimensions, media, memories, etc...  The Runes "Runas in ptbr" in addition to the power of being my signature, they also carry real iconographic power of cooperation to change something or someone or somewhere. In words used by cultures with older technologies "magic"
